name: Education Nation
title: High Educational Attainment
description: In 2022, Montenegro boasted a high educational attainment with 65.53% of males and 58.19% of females aged 25+ holding at least a Bachelor's degree, totaling 61.09% for the entire population.

name: Immunization Woes
title: Low Measles Immunization Rate
description: In 2023, only 24% of children aged 12-23 months in Montenegro were immunized against measles, highlighting a significant public health challenge.

name: Design Drought
title: Minimal Industrial Design Applications
description: In 2020, Montenegro had only 1 resident industrial design application, indicating a low level of industrial innovation.

name: Peaceful Exporter
title: Limited Arms Exports
description: In 2017, Montenegro's arms exports were valued at $1,000,000, reflecting a minimal contribution to global arms trade.

name: Tariff Tranquility
title: Negligible Tariff Peaks on Manufactured Goods
description: In 2022, only 0.001% of Montenegro's tariff lines on manufactured products had international peaks, suggesting a favorable trade environment.

name: Disaster Resilience
title: Minimal New Displacements Due to Disasters
description: In 2023, Montenegro reported only 1 new case of internal displacement due to disasters, indicating strong disaster management and resilience.
